snippet: A presidential candidate who is not short of campaign promises is specific on some proposals, but vague on others.
abstract: Vagueness of some of the policy proposals coming out of Mitt Romney presidential campaigns policy has been brought up not just by Democrats, but also by his fellow Republicans and some conservative-leaning publications.
lead_paragraph: A presidential candidate who is not short of campaign promises is specific on some proposals, but vague on others.

headline.seo: Mitt Romney Remains Vague on Details of Some Proposals
headline.main: Some Romney Proposals Await Fuller Detail
headline.print_headline: Some Romney Proposals Await Fuller Detail
